content.description: In the figure above, two small spheres, each with charge +Q, are fixed in place at the corners of an equilateral triangle. Point I is at the third corner, and point II is midway between the charges.
content.question: Which of the following best describes the relationship between the electric potentials VI and VII at points I and II, respectively?

choices.label: It cannot be determined without knowing the magnitudes of the charges.
It cannot be determined without knowing the distance between points I and II.

skill.text: 2.C: Compare physical quantities between two or more scenarios or at different times and locations in a single scenario.
